t: I*p will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.
I*p will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
In*p the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
All*p the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O Lord,*s when they hear the words of thy mouth.
Yea,*p they shall sing in the ways of the Lord:*s for great is the glory of the Lord.*s
Though*p the Lord*s be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
Though*p I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.
The*p Lord*s will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord,*s endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
